description.title: Description
description.description: An optional longer description of what this relation respresents in your system

subject_resource.title: Subject Resource
subject_resource.description: The subject resource ID or key

key.title: Key
key.description: A URL-friendly name of the relation (i.e: slug). You will be able to query later using this key instead of the id (UUID) of the relation.

organization_id.title: Organization Id
organization_id.description: Unique id of the organization that the relation belongs to.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Unique id of the project that the relation belongs to.

environment_id.title: Environment Id
environment_id.description: Unique id of the environment that the relation belongs to.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Date and time when the relation was created (ISO_8601 format).

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: Date and time when the relation was last updated/modified (ISO_8601 format).
